short_summary: Contractor needed for printing and distribution services for Veterans Affairs Canada
description: This contract requires a contractor to provide printing, warehousing, order fulfillment and distribution services for a variety of Veterans Affairs Canada products. The contract will be in effect for 1 year with the possibility of extending for 3 additional years.
tags: Material, Goods or service of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement - Service ],
full_summary:
### VAC Printing Services
#### Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4473140448
- **Reference Number**: WS4473140448-Doc4473192399
- **Amendment Number**: 6
- **Publication Date**: 2024-03-05
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-29 14:00:00

#### Overview
The Department of Veterans Affairs Canada requires a contractor to provide a range of printing services, including variable on-demand printing, warehousing, inventory control, order processing, and distribution.

#### Key Services
- Printing
- Warehousing
- Inventory Control
- Order Processing
- Order Fulfillment
- Online Ordering Site
- Mail Preparation
- Distribution
- Tracking and Reporting

#### Contract Details
- Contract Duration: 1 year, with irrevocable option to extend for 3 additional 1-year periods and a 5-month transition period
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-05-01
- Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

#### Security Requirements
This tender includes security requirements. Please refer to the tender documentation for details.

#### Contact Information
- ***Contact Name***: Marc-André Leblanc (SPAC/PSPC)
- ***Email***: marc-andre.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This tender has since closed.

#### Procurement Details
- ***Procurement Category***: SRV
- ***Procurement Method***: Competitive - Open Bidding
- ***Trade Agreements***: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- ***Regions of Delivery***: Canada
- ***End User Entities***: Department of Veterans Affairs (VAC) and three major Veterans Affairs Sections that require services under this requirement:

(Communications Division, Commemoration Division (Veterans’ Week), and Service Delivery Branch for the Personalized Booklet Program)

Please note that all tender documentation can be accessed through the standard procurement processes. 
Your job is as easy as a click of the button now!

Best regards,
